title: Creator of the Smart Saddle Launches Kickstarter Campaign
text:
The Smart Saddle is the first universal phone and tablet stand crafted from quality materials and made to withstand continued use. It is compatible with any device with up to 10.5-inch screens. Creator Paramount Tool LLC located in Fall River, MA has now launched a Kickstarter campaign to raise funds for production and distribution.
As seen at www.TheSmartSaddle.com , the Smart Saddle holds a smartphone or tablet in either portrait or landscape position. Made in the USA, this product is the only one of its kind to offer a lifetime functional warranty. The Smart Saddle provides a stable solution to those who want to operate their phones or tablets while resting them on a stand. Unlike many flimsy products, the Smart Saddle has been rigorously tested with a variety of smartphones and tablets to ensure quality and stability. The manufacturing will remain in America for as long as the product is made. The Smart Saddle is currently available in black or white to blend with any d√©cor and is made of quality, long-lasting materials.
The Kickstarter funds raised will be used to invest in retail packaging, a marketing campaign, and to create multiple color options. Funds will also be used to manufacture tooling in order to produce the product more quickly and cheaply while still maintaining the highest quality standards.
As seen at http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/887254035/the-smart-saddle-universal-phone-and-tablet-stand , the Kickstarter campaign offers pledge levels from $25 to $250, with prizes including Smart Saddles in different colors, t-shirts and other prizes. For complete information about the pledge levels and the associated awards, visit the Kickstarter page.
About The Smart Saddle:
The Smart Saddle is a smartphone and tablet stand that is crafted in the United States from the highest quality materials available and offers a lifetime functional warranty. Now, the creator of this product has launched a Kickstarter campaign to raise funds for manufacturing and marketing.
